actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to establish a Commission on South Korean Influences.

summary.text: Establishes within the House of Representatives the Commission on South Korean Influence to conduct an investigation into alleged South Korean influence-buying in Congress and to make recommendations to Congress concerning Members who have received gifts in violation of House rules. Vests exclusive jurisdiction to investigate such alleged South Korean influence-buying in the Commission. Directs the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to cease its investigation into such matter.

titles.title: Resolution to establish a Commission on South Korean Influences.
